# aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper { #juscraper.aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper }

```python
aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper(
    verbose=0,
    download_path=None,
    sleep_time=0.5,
    token=None,
)
```

Raspador para o JusBR (consulta unificada da PDPJ-CNJ).
Este scraper interage com a API da Plataforma Digital do Poder Judiciário (PDPJ).

## Methods

| Name | Description |
| --- | --- |
| [auth](#juscraper.aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper.auth) | Define o token JWT para autenticação e o decodifica para verificação. |
| [auth_firefox](#juscraper.aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper.auth_firefox) | Autenticação via Firefox. |
| [cpopg](#juscraper.aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper.cpopg) | Consulta processos pelo número CNJ (ou lista de números CNJ) via API nacional. |
| [download_documents](#juscraper.aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper.download_documents) | Baixa os textos dos documentos para os processos em base_df. |

### auth { #juscraper.aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper.auth }

```python
aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper.auth(token)
```

### cpopg { #juscraper.aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper.cpopg }

```python
aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper.cpopg(id_cnj)
```

### download_documents { #juscraper.aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper.download_documents }

```python
aggregators.jusbr.client.JusbrScraper.download_documents(
    base_df,
    max_docs_per_process=None,
)
```

Baixa os textos dos documentos para os processos em base_df.
Iterates through processes in base_df, extracts document metadata from the
'detalhes' column, fetches, and cleans document texts.
Returns a DataFrame where each row is a document.
